fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm auto-upgrade restarts services when sudo requires a password
fields.request_details:
1. On a managed node (locks/service.lck present), run `sudo -K` and confirm `sudo -n true` exits with a non-zero status so passwordless sudo is unavailable.
2. Trigger an auto-upgrade via `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates()"`.
3. After the task finishes, run `systemctl status $(cat locks/service.lck)` and verify the service reports `active (running)`.
4. Open System â†’ Upgrade Report and confirm the most recent log entry notes the service restart succeeded after the upgrade.
